nats_minimize_scripts module¶

nats_minimize_scripts.read_pdb_ends()[source]¶

Reads at which index each pdb sequence is starting from the pdb_ends.txt file from ../data/input/etc :return: Dictionary. Keys: structure pdb id, Values: ending index :rtype: dict

nats_minimize_scripts.read_pdb_starts()[source]¶

Reads at which index each pdb sequence is starting from the pdb_starts.txt file from ../data/input/etc :return: Dictionary. Keys: structure pdb id, Values: starting index :rtype: dict

nats_minimize_scripts.test_missing_res(filename, pdbfile_path)[source]¶

Detects gaps in residue sequence numbers and split the structure pdb file in two different ones for further handling withe minimization scripts (Charmm) :param filename: Name for the pdb file being handled :param pdbfile_path: Path for the pdb file :return: Array of the wo split pdb file names :rtype: str[]
